title: OpenSock — Data Collection
slides.title: How to take photos
collect.title: Start a contribution
collect.name: Display name (optional)
collect.notify: Notify me via email when results are ready
collect.consent: I consent to contribute photos of socks only and accept the Terms & Privacy.
note.privacy: We collect nothing but the images you submit.
note.no_zoom: Please do not switch cameras or change the zoom between photos.
contribute.title: Contribute
about.title: Teach OpenSock to sort socks
about.purpose: OpenSock is meant to make it possible to automatically sort a pile of socks on the floor into pairs using just a single photo.
about.why: You can contribute photos of your socks to support the AI training. Simply spread your socks on the floor after the next wash—before sorting them—and snap a few photos. Every contribution helps, whether you’re sock-rich with a wide variety or sock-poor with many of the same kind.
about.family: Optionally, the socks will be sortable by family member.
about.modes.title: What you can contribute:
about.modes.mixed: Mixed Types: Images with different socks (by size, color or pattern) for learning great variety.
about.modes.same: Same Type: Image with identical socks (same size, color and pattern) for learning fine‑grained details).
mode.mixed.title: Mixed Uniques
mode.same.title: Same Type
mode.preview.note: Keep socks in place; flip/crumple between photos.
rules.shared: Take clear photos; For the first photo, spread the socks on the floor with plenty of space between them. From the second photo onward, keep the socks in exactly the same position.
rules.mixed: Mode 'Mixed Socks': Each sock must differ in some way from all the others. So never place two identical socks in the picture.
rules.same: Mode 'Same Socks': Use exactly the same socks across all photos. All socks should be of the same type.
collect.need_min: Add at least {n} images before finalizing.
slides.mixed.1.title: Flat, stretched
slides.mixed.2.title: Flip sides (in place)
slides.mixed.3.title: Crumple A (in place)
slides.mixed.4.title: Crumple B (optional)
slides.mixed.5.title: Extras (optional)
slides.same.1.title: Flat grid (in place)
slides.same.2.title: Flip sides (in place)
slides.same.3.title: Crumple (in place)
slides.same.4.title: Extras (optional)
recap.title: Contribution submitted
recap.nudge: For best results, keep about 20 socks per photo with some spacing. Start another contribution for more.
errors.upload.unsupported_format: Unsupported image format. Please upload JPEG or PNG.
errors.upload.too_large: File too large. Maximum allowed is {limit} MB.
errors.upload.duplicate: No new images uploaded. If you re-used the same photo, please take a fresh one (duplicates are skipped).
upload.low_res_hint: For better results, use higher resolution if possible.
collect.name_help: If you want, we can list this name in credits later.
collect.handle_help: For credits (e.g. @name). Leave blank to stay anonymous.
errors.upload.at_limit: You have reached the image limit. Please submit now.
example.caption: How it should look
admin.title: Admin
admin.config.title: Config
admin.config.subtitle: Server-side contribution limits
admin.sessions.title: Sessions
admin.table.name: Name
ios.motion.explain: Enable motion sensors to show level/tilt hints for better framing.
privacy.p1: We store only the images you submit, plus optional display name, social handle, and email. Numeric focal length may be parsed if present. No trackers or analytics are used.
privacy.p2: You may request deletion of your contributions any time by contacting us from your provided email.
terms.p1: By contributing images of socks, you grant OpenSock permission to use them for research, training, and evaluation. You can request deletion at any time by contacting us from the email you provided.
terms.p2: No analytics or trackers are used. Do not submit images with people or private scenes.
terms.p3: Controller: Erik Stern, Gutmaninger Straße 26, 93413 Cham, Germany. Contact: erik.stern@outlook.de
admin.help: Enter the admin password, then search or manage settings.
confirm.title: Please confirm the instructions
confirm.note: Before starting, confirm you’ve read the instructions.
